Post.title: Blog
Post._content:
# 

*  [node.js](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/)
* [git](https://git-scm.com/)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/signup?user_email=&source=form-home-signup)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/new)
* [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.com/)

<!-- more -->

## node.js
npm
```bash
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org/
```

```bash
npm config get registry
```

## git
Git
```bash
git --version
```
Git
```bash
git config --global user.name "" 
git config --global user.email ""
```
## GitHub
`RSA`
```bash
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C ""
```
****

rsa
```bash
cat ~./.ssh/id_rsa.pub
```
[GitHub SSH Keys](https://github.com/settings/ssh/new)

##  GitHub
{%note warning%} **==****Public**{%endnote%}

##  Travis CI
{%note warning%} 2021-06-15  [travis-ci.com](https://www.travis-ci.com/) {%endnote%}
1. GitHub[](https://travis-ci.com/signin)
2. [](https://travis-ci.com/account/repositories)
![Travis ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630111048.png)

# hexo
## hexo
`terminal/cmd`
```bash 
npm install -g hexo-cli
```
hexo
```bash
hexo -v
```
## hexo
****`new-hexo-blog`
```bash
hexo init new-hexo-blog
cd new-hexo-blog
npm install
```
`new-hexo-blog`
```bash
. 
 _config.yml 
 package.json 
 node_modules 
 scaffolds 
 source 
|	 _drafts 
|	 _posts 
 themes

```

`_config.yml```
`scaffolds`
`source `

`new-hexo-blog`
```bash
hexo server #4000
#hexo server -p 8000 #-p 
```
`http://localhost:4000`

# GitHub Pages
{%note info%}Travis CI********`main``gh-pages`{%endnote%}

## GitHub
GitHub
```bash
cd new-hexo-blog
git init
git add .
git commit -am "init blog"
git remote add origin blog
git push -u origin main # GitHub
#git push -f -u origin main # -f 
```
`gh-pages`
```bash
git checkout -b gh-pages # hexogh-pages
git push -u origin gh-pages
```
`Settings``Pages`tab`gh-pages`

## hexo

`new-hexo-blog``hexo`(`_config.yml`)
```yml
url: https://lusk-liu.github.io/new-hexo-blog/ # Pages
root: /new-hexo-blog/ 
deploy: 
  type: 'git' 
  repo: git@github.com:Lusk-Liu/new-hexo-blog.git # 
  branch: gh-pages
```
`hexo-deployer-git`
```bash
cd new-hexo-blog
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

```bash
hexo clean && hexo generate
hexo deploy
# hexo clean && hexo g -d # 
```
`main`
```bash
git checkout main
git add .
git commit -am "commit message"
git push
```
# Travis CI
`new-hexo-blog``hexo`(`_config.yml`)`repo`
```yml
deploy: 
  type: 'git' 
  # repo: git@github.com:Lusk-Liu/new-hexo-blog.git # 
  branch: gh-pages
```
`new-hexo-blog``.travis.yml``_config.yml`
```yml
sudo: false 
language: node_js 
node_js: 
  - 14 # node.js
cache: npm 
branches: 
  only: 
  - main # build main 
script: 
  - hexo generate 
deploy: 
  provider: pages 
  skip-cleanup: true 
  github-token: $GH_TOKEN # Travis
  keep-history: true 
  on: 
    branch: main 
  local-dir: public
```

`Travis``GitHub`[](https://travis-ci.com/dashboard)
![Travis Dashboard](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630111300.png)

[](https://github.com/settings/tokens)`token``Travis`
![token](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630105509.png)

`travis`blog`settings - Environment Variables ``token`
![blog](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630111610.png)

![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630112215.png)
blogGitHub
```bash
cd hexo-new-blog
git checkout main 
hexo new "my first blog" 
git add . 
git commit -am"add a new blog" 
git push
```
`Travis CI`build

# 

*  [node.js](https://nodejs.org/zh-cn/)
* [git](https://git-scm.com/)

## node.js

```bash
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org/
```

# hexo

```bash 
npm install -g hexo-cli
```

```bash
. 
 _config.yml

|	 _drafts
```

# GitHub Pages
{%note info%}Travis CI********`main``gh-pages`{%endnote%}

```bash
cd new-hexo-blog

git add .

git remote add origin blog
git push -u origin main # GitHub
#git push -f -u origin main # -f 
```
`gh-pages`
```bash
git checkout -b gh-pages # hexogh-pages
git push -u origin gh-pages
```
`Settings``Pages`tab`gh-pages`

## hexo

`new-hexo-blog``hexo`(`_config.yml`)
```yml
url: https://lusk-liu.github.io/new-hexo-blog/ # Pages
root: /new-hexo-blog/ 
deploy: 
  type: 'git' 
  repo: git@github.com:Lusk-Liu/new-hexo-blog.git # 
  branch: gh-pages
```
`hexo-deployer-git`
```bash
cd new-hexo-blog
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

```bash
hexo clean && hexo generate
hexo deploy
# hexo clean && hexo g -d # 
```
`main`
```bash
git checkout main
git add .
git commit -am "commit message"
git push
```
# Travis CI
`new-hexo-blog``hexo`(`_config.yml`)`repo`
```yml
deploy: 
  type: 'git' 
  # repo: git@github.com:Lusk-Liu/new-hexo-blog.git # 
  branch: gh-pages
```
`new-hexo-blog``.travis.yml``_config.yml`
```yml
sudo: false 
language: node_js 
node_js: 
  - 14 # node.js
cache: npm 
branches: 
  only: 
  - main # build main 
script: 
  - hexo generate 
deploy: 
  provider: pages 
  skip-cleanup: true 
  github-token: $GH_TOKEN # Travis
  keep-history: true 
  on: 
    branch: main 
  local-dir: public
```

`Travis``GitHub`[](https://travis-ci.com/dashboard)
![Travis Dashboard](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630111300.png)

[](https://github.com/settings/tokens)`token``Travis`
![token](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630105509.png)

`travis`blog`settings - Environment Variables ``token`
![blog](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630111610.png)

![](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Lusk-Liu/GitHub-hosting@main/blog/img20210630112215.png)
